description: The Gonzo Series features our favorite camp collar silhouette, giving you room to breathe and relax no matter the situation. Call it a party shirt, we call it an everyday shirt. This season, Roark teamed up with famed local artist Yiling Changues, a Tahitian graphic designer, illustrator, writer, animator, philosopher, poetess, anthropologist, and professional daydreamer to produce her rendition of Tahiti’s colorful beauty on the Gonzo Yiling.
name: Roark Gonzo Yiling Collar Shirt - Mens
